channel.title: Help is needed, :)
channel.description:
I've just got done editing all my magics so that they actully look right (Took awhile :P)
Anyways, I was wondering how I can add the effect of the whip when you run with it, attk with it, walk with it, etc...I have the emote numbers and everything but I'm not sure how. It would be greatly appreciated because I was also wondering how to do it to all weapons like Dharok's Axe, etc...
And also how I can make the flail, x-bow, staff/spears, stand right too. :P
And last but not least (Answer this last because it's not as important) how I can make my NPCs attack with their style like Guthan for instance. He attacks nothing like he should.
Thanks abunch. :)

item.title: Help is needed, :)
item.dc:creator: @georgef35 georgef35
item.description:
@georgef35 wrote:

[quote=“emyy11, post:3, topic:5908”][quote author=Kitno link=topic=7945.msg84392#msg84392 date=1153686716]
I’ve just got done editing all my magics so that they actully look right (Took awhile :P)

Anyways, I was wondering how I can add the effect of the whip when you run with it, attk with it, walk with it, etc…I have the emote numbers and everything but I’m not sure how. It would be greatly appreciated because I was also wondering how to do it to all weapons like Dharok’s Axe, etc…

And also how I can make the flail, x-bow, staff/spears, stand right too.

And last but not least (Answer this last because it’s not as important) how I can make my NPCs attack with their style like Guthan for instance. He attacks nothing like he should.

Thanks abunch.
[/quote] search on www.google.com <-- moparscape emote list and then add it to ur source folder and compiler …Thats it[/quote]

this topic is 2yr old he mustve quitted by now or hes a pro coder ure shity gramar aint gona help him
